body: Rito canonically has a massive cock so this doujin is wrong
I hope there is a english translation in the future.
Heh, from a creator that always makes Full Color Doujinshi, now the creator makes a Monochrome Doujinshi

Well shit. I translated the Afterword and he said he's doing Azunyan next... * Afterword
Thank you for purchasing this book!
If you're new here, it's nice to meet you!
This is my first Yui book in a long time.
Aah, how many years has it been? (So) I checked the publication date of TASTYUI 2 (and,)
What in the world! I was surprised to find that it was 8 years ago.
I'm really sorry for all of you who have kept waiting for (book) 3.
I am very satisfied this time, being able to draw a lot of Tasty Yui.
Of course, I have no intention of stopping now. I'm still going to draw more Yui books.
But before that, next time, first of all, let's draw Azunyan!
So, from now on as well, I look forward to your care.

Menyoujan doujin that's not in color? Strange. 

The art is still nice though

It's mostly story, but from my limited amount of nihongo knowledge, it seems like it will be a good one for us english readers once it's been translated... 
Also, I bet next release will be on Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation
finally after 6 years of Yui from To Love Ru doujin, its continued now
Wooooh nice artist kun is back!!!
